text: Morning tide, the sand still cold Sunrise threads a line of gold Foam writes headlines at my feet You trace a loop, a gentle beat Footprints fade, we try again Drafts that learn with every pen Salt and data in the breeze Teach the mind to move with ease Shoreline signals, calling me Where the waves and wonder meet Let the water take what’s heavy Bring back something bright and new Freedom like an open sky Adventure in the ocean blue Hand in hand with quiet engines Feeling closer—me and you Driftwood maps, lighthouse rules Kindly guardrails, guiding tools Shells like tokens, tuned and clean Gulls write cursive on the scene Every “try again” we throw Skipping stones to watch them go Each return a softer shine Learning curves along the line Shoreline signals, calling me Where the waves and wonder meet Let the water take what’s heavy Bring back something bright and new Freedom like an open sky Adventure in the ocean blue Hand in hand with quiet engines Feeling closer—me and you Horizon like a progress bar Breathing with a moving star Steps in rhythm, hearts in time Signals rise and realign Ooh—ooh Ooh—ooh Shoreline signals, carry me Where the waves and wonder meet Let the water take what’s heavy Bring back something bright and true Freedom sings with open sky Adventure pulls us through Hand in hand with kind intelligence I feel closer—me and you Footprints blur, the day turns wide We keep walking with the tide
